pages.title: Draconic Catalyst
pages.text: A catalyst extracted from the soul of the Ender Dragon. As a boss, it's immune to statuses, so Daggers have a 25% chance of dropping a Catalyst when hitting it.
Complete the Catalyst by following the recipe. I hope your Dragon Egg wasn't lost.

When used in a Runic Artifact, an Draconic Catalyst produces Draconic Materia. Draconic Materia can be consumed for experience or transformed into Diamonds, Dragon Breath, Dragon Eggs or Dragon Heads.
